text: The Young Guard (, translit. Molodaya Gvardiya) is a 1948 Russian World War II drama movie directed by Sergei Gerasimov and was based on the novel of the same name by Alexander Fadeyev. It stars Vladimir Ivanov, Inna Makarova, Nonna Mordyukova, Sergei Gurzo, Lyudmila Shagalova, Aleksandr Antonov. ==Other websites== * Category:1948 drama movies Category:1948 war movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Sergei Gerasimov
title: The Young Guard (movie)
